products.title: Nutritional yeast flakes
products.description: Nutritional yeast is a natural food supplement that gives every dish a rich, mildly nutty and 'cheesy' flavor. Ideal for sprinkling over pasta, salads, soups, or stews. It's completely plant-based, while being extremely nutritious and easily digestible.
benefits: Extremely rich in proteins (up to 50.4g protein per 100g product)
Rich source of B-complex vitamins, including vitamin B12
Source of all essential amino acids
products.ingredients: Nutritional yeast

products.title: Mileram
products.description: Plant-based mileram that makes no compromises — creamy, light, and perfectly neutral in taste. Fermented product made from plant fats, soy proteins, and pea fiber, excellent choice for both savory and sweet dishes. No lactose, no cholesterol, but full of flavor!
benefits: Can be used for both savory and sweet dishes
products.ingredients: Water, soy, soy protein, vegetable oil (palm), pea fiber, acidity regulator (glucono-delta-lactone), fermentation culture

products.title: Tempeh
products.description: Tempeh is a traditional product made from fermented soybeans, known for its high protein and fiber content. With a mild, nutty flavor and firm texture, it's an excellent choice for baking, frying, or marinating. It perfectly combines with vegetables and grains as an extremely nutritious and satisfying meal.
benefits: Rich in plant proteins and fiber
products.ingredients: Soy 98%, starter culture (Rhizopus Oligosporus)

products.title: Fried tempeh
products.description: Fried tempeh is a ready-to-eat, practical, and extremely nutritious plant-based product. Through soybean fermentation, it gains a characteristic full flavor and firm texture. Thanks to its mild nutty taste and high protein content, it's an ideal addition to vegetable dishes, grains, salads, or sandwiches.
products.ingredients: Soy 98%, non-hydrogenated vegetable oil (sunflower), starter culture (Rhizopus Oligosporus), sea salt

products.title: Fried seitan
products.description: Fried seitan is a high-protein plant-based product based on wheat gluten, with texture and flavor richness reminiscent of meat. It can be consumed independently, as part of a meal, or as an addition to vegetable and grain dishes. Simple to use – just heat and enjoy.
products.ingredients: Water, wheat gluten, wheat flour, sea salt, spice blend, non-hydrogenated vegetable oil (sunflower)

products.title: Smoked tofu
products.description: Smoked tofu is a full-flavored product with pleasant aroma, smoked on beech wood. It contains a high amount of plant proteins and is completely cholesterol-free. Can be used as an addition to salads, sandwiches, pasta, or vegetable dishes, as well as a replacement for smoked cheese.
products.ingredients: Soy 59%, water, magnesium chloride (nigari), sea salt

products.title: Fried tofu
products.description: Fried tofu is a perfect solution for a quick, tasty, and nutritious meal. It's already thermally processed, so it's ready to use – just add it to salads, hot meals, or Asian dishes. It has a mild flavor and pleasant texture, and is an excellent source of plant proteins for every day.
products.ingredients: Soy 58%, water, non-hydrogenated vegetable oil (sunflower), magnesium chloride (nigari), sea salt

products.title: Raw tofu
products.description: Raw tofu is the basic and most natural form of tofu, ideal for those who love to experiment in the kitchen. It has a mild flavor, so it easily absorbs the aromas of spices and marinades. It can be cooked, fried, baked, or added to soups and stews – always a healthy and light source of protein.
benefits: Rich in iron, calcium, and magnesium
products.ingredients: Soy 60%, water, magnesium chloride (nigari), sea salt

products.title: Almond butter
products.description: 100% natural almond butter – no additives, just carefully ground almonds. Contains healthy fats and proteins, ideal for breakfast, smoothies, or desserts.
products.ingredients: Almonds 100%

products.title: Peanut butter 99.5%
products.description: Perfect balance of flavor and nutrition – 99.5% pure peanuts and a pinch of sea salt. Creamy, tasty, and naturally rich in proteins. Excellent as a spread or addition to meals and desserts.
products.ingredients: Peanuts 99.5%, sea salt 0.5%

products.title: Tahini – sesame butter
products.description: Traditional tahini from roasted sesame, delicate texture and rich flavor. Base of many Middle Eastern dishes, perfect as a dressing or addition to savory and sweet recipes.
benefits: Source of calcium, iron, and fiber
products.ingredients: Sesame 100%

products.title: Pumpkin seed butter
products.description: Made from 90% pumpkin seeds, this butter is a nutritional bomb. Full of proteins, minerals, and healthy fats, excellent as a spread or addition to savory and sweet dishes.
benefits: Source of zinc, iron, and fiber
products.ingredients: Roasted pumpkin seeds (pepitas) 90%, non-hydrogenated vegetable oil (sunflower), soy lecithin, sea salt

products.title: Hazelnut butter
products.description: Delicate and natural hazelnut flavor, without any additives. Perfect in desserts, smoothies, or as a tasty and healthy spread.
benefits: Source of many micronutrients and fiber
products.ingredients: Hazelnuts 100%

products.title: Smoked roast
products.description: Perfect blend of tradition and plants! Our smoked roast is made from wheat protein and smoked on beech wood for an authentic aroma and taste. Juicy, aromatic, and rich in proteins — you can eat it cold with bread and salad, or add it to hot meals and sandwiches.
products.ingredients: Water, wheat protein, pea protein, pea fiber, non-hydrogenated vegetable oil (sunflower), corn starch, sea salt, yeast extract, ginger, paprika, garlic, tomato powder, spice blend, flavoring

products.title: Vege burger
products.description: Gen!e Vege burger is a healthier alternative to the classic burger – juicy, full of protein and great taste. Made from carefully selected plant ingredients like pea and soy protein, without artificial additives. Perfect for a quick meal at home or on the grill.
products.ingredients: Water, soy protein isolate, sunflower oil, pea protein, hydrolyzed soy protein, potato starch, sea salt, thickeners (methyl cellulose, microcrystalline cellulose), garlic powder, onion powder, dextrose, beet powder, yeast extract, paprika extract, tomato powder, spices, flavoring

products.title: Soy sausages classic
products.description: Soy sausages classic are simple but perfectly tasty plant-based meals. They contain a carefully balanced blend of soy and wheat, with natural spices that give a full, homey taste. Ready to eat, and can also be heated, grilled, or added to vegetable dishes.
benefits: Source of high-quality plant proteins (16.9g protein per 100g product)
Traditional taste in a healthier version
products.ingredients: Water, soy 32%, wheat gluten, acidity regulator (glucono-delta-lactone), yeast extract, dried paprika, garlic, sea salt, spice blend

products.title: Soy sausages spicy
products.description: For those who love spicy flavors! Spicy soy sausages bring the perfect balance of soy, wheat, and spices, with a mild, pleasant spicy tone. Ideal as an addition to vegetable dishes, in tortillas, salads, or as a healthier replacement for classic sausages.
benefits: Source of high-quality plant proteins (16.9g protein per 100g product)
Traditional taste in a healthier version
products.ingredients: Water, soy 32%, wheat gluten, non-hydrogenated vegetable oil (sunflower), hot paprika, acidity regulator (glucono-delta-lactone), yeast extract, dried paprika, garlic, sea salt, spice blend

products.title: Soy sausages fasting on water
products.description: Light, nutritious, and completely oil-free, our soy sausages fasting on water prove that even simple dishes can be rich in flavor. Made from a carefully selected combination of soy and wheat, they are ideal for fasting days or for anyone who wants a healthier, protein meal without additional fats. Ready to consume – just serve with your favorite vegetables, mustard, or fresh bread.
benefits: Source of high-quality plant proteins (22.3g protein per 100g product)
Traditional taste in a healthier version

products.title: Hot-dog
products.description: Soy hot dog is a healthy alternative to classic sausages – equally juicy and tasty, but made exclusively from plant proteins and healthier ingredients. Perfectly fits into hot sandwiches, tortillas, or quick meals. Light, nutritious, and simple to prepare.
benefits: Less saturated fatty acids compared to meat products
products.ingredients: Water, non-hydrogenated vegetable oil (sunflower), soy protein, potato starch, thickeners (Purified sea algae Eucheuma, konjac gum, xanthan gum) yeast extract, methyl cellulose, microcrystalline cellulose, sea salt, spice blend, flavoring, beet juice concentrate powder

products.title: Grill sausages
products.description: Juicy, aromatic, and perfect for every grill! Our plant-based grill sausages are a rich source of pea protein, without artificial additives. Crispy on the outside, soft on the inside – ideal for everyone who loves a good grill but chooses plant-based food.
benefits: Less saturated fatty acids compared to meat products
products.ingredients: Water, sunflower oil, pea protein, modified starch, plant fiber, sea salt, methyl cellulose, sea algae eusheuma extract, konjac gum, xanthan gum, maltodextrin, spices and spice extracts, enzymes, flavorings, citric acid, preservative (potassium sorbate)

products.title: Salami Classic
products.description: Classic salami – in plant version! Full of flavor, rich in proteins and without additives, Gen!e Salami Classic is perfect for sandwiches, salads, or quick meals. Juicy, tasty, and always ready to replace meat products — without anything animal, but with everything we love in good salami.
benefits: Less saturated fatty acids compared to meat products
products.ingredients: Water, sunflower oil, pea protein, bean protein, modified starch, plant fiber, sea algae eusheuma extract, konjac gum, xanthan gum, sea salt, maltodextrin, spices and spice extracts, flavorings, citric acid, preservative (potassium sorbate)

products.title: Tofu spread natural
products.description: Simple, natural, and versatile – tofu spread natural is an ideal choice for everyone who loves mild, creamy flavors. You can spread it on bread, use it as a salad dressing or as a base for sauces. It perfectly fits both savory and sweet dishes.
benefits: Can be used as a sauce, dressing, or meal addition
products.ingredients: Tofu (soy, water, nigari) 60%, soy protein, sunflower oil, corn starch, apple vinegar, garlic, sea salt, mustard

products.title: Tofu spread with sesame
products.description: Tofu spread with sesame combines the delicate texture of tofu and the aroma of roasted sesame. Ideal as a base for sandwiches, salad dressing, or addition to hot meals. Loved by everyone who enjoys mild, nutty flavor and natural ingredients.
benefits: Can be used as a sauce, dressing, or meal addition
products.ingredients: Tofu (soy, water, nigari) 60%, soy protein, sunflower oil, corn starch, apple vinegar, sesame 6%, garlic, sea salt, mustard

products.title: Tofu spread with peanut butter
products.description: Irresistible combination of tofu and peanuts! This spread has a full, rich flavor and is perfect as a base for sandwiches or as a dip with fruit, vegetables, and crackers. The combination of creamy texture and nutritious ingredients makes it an ideal choice for a quick and healthy meal.
benefits: Can be used as a sauce, dressing, or meal addition
products.ingredients: Tofu (soy, water, nigari) 60%, peanut butter, soy protein, sunflower oil, corn starch, apple vinegar, garlic, sea salt, mustard

products.title: Tofu spread with dill
products.description: This refreshing plant spread combines the delicate creamy texture of tofu and the recognizable flavor of fresh dill. Lightly aromatic and full of protein – perfect for sandwiches, warm toasted bread, or as an addition to salads and vegetables. Enjoy the flavor that refreshes every piece of bread!
benefits: Can be used as a sauce, dressing, or meal addition
products.ingredients: Tofu (soy, water, nigari) 60%, soy protein, sunflower oil, corn starch, apple vinegar, dill 4%, garlic, sea salt, mustard

products.title: Tofu spread with paprika
products.description: Creamy, light, and mildly spicy – tofu spread with paprika is a perfect addition to every meal. Excellent as a breakfast spread, addition to pasta, or as a dip with vegetables. It provides the perfect balance between flavor and nutrition.
benefits: Can be used as a sauce, dressing, or meal addition
products.ingredients: Tofu (soy, water, nigari) 60%, soy protein, sunflower oil, corn starch, apple vinegar, paprika 5%, garlic, sea salt, mustard

products.title: Tofu spread fasting on water
products.description: For everyone who fasts or avoids oil, this tofu spread is a perfect solution. Light texture, full flavor, and without milk, oil, and nuts, it's excellent as an addition to bread, salads, or hot meals. Healthy, simple, and practical for every day.
benefits: Can be used as a sauce, dressing, or meal addition
products.ingredients: Tofu (soy, water, nigari) 65%, soy protein, corn starch, apple vinegar, sesame, garlic, sea salt, mustard

products.title: Hummus in intestine
products.description: Hummus in practical packaging – ready for every occasion. Perfectly creamy and light, ideal for sandwiches, dressings, and meals on the go.
benefits: Can be used as a sauce, dressing, or meal addition
products.ingredients: Chickpeas (raw chickpeas) 70%, sesame butter, non-hydrogenated vegetable oil (sunflower), apple vinegar, sea salt, garlic, pepper
